channel.title: Couple questions
channel.description: 1. how do i creat a shop 2. how do i take out items and put in items in a existing shop 3. how do i raise the bonus (att str def pray etc...) on a item thanks for looking at my post ill check reply's tomorrow

  3. Item.cfg, Look up the Item name or Item id and look at the numbers after it, change those numbers to change the bonus’
